name: Hotwired
description:
You're an ordinary taxi driver with an extraordinary bad luck. You lost your keys, so now you have to hotwire your own car to drive your clients across the city.

Click and hold the corresponding wire to accelerate, steer left and right, decelerate and turn on GPS (points you to the right direction). Stop within a circle to drop a client and pick up a new one.

One more thing: the faster you go, the more of the city you can see, but harder it is to steer.

Hotwired was created for GMTK Jam 2020 (Theme: Out of control).
